document.full_text: the state parole board granted parole in 2021 for richard a. schonefeld, who was convicted of hijacking a chowchilla school bus and holding 26 children and their driver underground.
document.title: west: california: parole recommended in 1976 kidnapping
lines_and_colors: the state parole board granted parole in 2021 for richard a. schonefeld, who was convicted of hijacking a chowchilla school bus and holding 26 children and their driver underground.
